description:
This introductory course provides key foundational
information related to the global regulation of medical
devices with emphasis placed on ASEAN, EU and AsiaPacific
countries. Additionally, the role of the global
regulatory professional will be examined in the context of
these regulatory frameworks. Covering pertinent subtopics
such as harmonization, ethics and legal perspectives, the
course will prepare students for more in-depth
examinations of submissions and the development of
regulatory strategy.
title: Introduction to Global Medical Device Regulation
